t: Why is there a shortage of canning jars? Newell Brands owns Ball, Kerr
s: April 6, 2022 - When the 2020 pandemic created a huge demand for canning supplies, Newell Brands decided it would not try to sell Ball and Kerr products at every store handling canning supplies as in the past, but only through online giant Amazon and select major chains such as Walmart and Ace Hardware stores.
